vote.title: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 32861, previously approved on September 18, 2024, as amended by Ordinance No. 32925 previously approved on December 11, 2024, authorizing (1) certain transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2024-25 for the maintenance and operation of various departments, and activities; and (2) the City Manager to implement those adjustments - Not to exceed $3,867,441,142 3,866,941,142 - Financing:  General Fund ($1,903,410,750), Enterprise Funds, Internal Service, and Other Funds ($1,766,760,252), and Grants, Trust, and Other Funds ($197,270,140 196,770,140)
